com.percussion.services.assembly
Interface IPSTemplateService

All Known Subinterfaces:
IPSAssemblyService
public interface IPSTemplateService

Manage templates and slots, allowing the creation, reading, updating and deleting of template and slot instances. Although the methods use interfaces, please be aware that objects to be passed to save or delete methods must be created with the create methods or loaded from the load and finder methods.

Author:
dougrand

Method Detail

createTemplate

IPSAssemblyTemplate createTemplate()
Create a new template object, but does not persist it. You must call this method to create a new template that can be persisted.

Returns:
a new template object, never null, with no allocated guid.

loadTemplate

IPSAssemblyTemplate loadTemplate(IPSGuid id,
                                 boolean loadSlots)
                                 throws PSAssemblyException
Load the given template instance by id.

Parameters:
id - the id of the template, never null
loadSlots - pass true if the related slot objects should be loaded into memory, otherwise they may not be accessed outside of a session
Returns:
the template, never null
Throws:
PSAssemblyException - if the template is not found or there are other problems loading the template from the database

loadTemplate

IPSAssemblyTemplate loadTemplate(String guid,
                                 boolean loadSlots)
                                 throws PSAssemblyException
Load the given template instance by string guid, calls loadTemplate(IPSGuid, boolean) internally. This is provided as a convenience function.

Parameters:
guid - the id of the template, never null or empty
loadSlots - pass true if the related slot objects should be loaded into memory, otherwise they may not be accessed outside of a session
Returns:
the template, never null
Throws:
PSAssemblyException - if the template is not found or there are other problems loading the template from the database

findAllTemplates

Set<IPSAssemblyTemplate> findAllTemplates()
                                          throws PSAssemblyException
Find and load all available templates. This is a fast call, but will return shared instances that must not be modified. Each returned object is a complete tree that includes all aggregated objects, if any. The returned objects cannot be saved by saveTemplate(IPSAssemblyTemplate).

Returns:
a list of templates, probably not empty, never null. the returned objects are cached and it should not be modified then saved via saveTemplate(IPSAssemblyTemplate).
Throws:
PSAssemblyException - if failed to load templates.

findAllGlobalTemplates

Set<IPSAssemblyTemplate> findAllGlobalTemplates()
                                                throws PSAssemblyException
Find and load all templates that are global templates.

Returns:
a list of zero or more matching templates. Never null. Does not contain the 5.7 legacy global templates.
Throws:
PSAssemblyException
See Also:
#findAll57GlobalTemplates()}

findAll57GlobalTemplates

Set<String> findAll57GlobalTemplates()
                                     throws PSAssemblyException
Returns the names of all the 5.7 legacy global templates.

Returns:
all the names of the 5.7 legacy global templates. Never null, can be empty.
Throws:
PSAssemblyException - on failure to retrieve the templates.

findTemplatesBySlot

List<IPSAssemblyTemplate> findTemplatesBySlot(IPSTemplateSlot slot)
                                              throws PSAssemblyException
Find templates that are related to a given slot.

Parameters:
slot - the slot, never null
Returns:
the list of templates, never null but can be empty
Throws:
PSAssemblyException

findTemplatesByAssemblyUrl

List<IPSAssemblyTemplate> findTemplatesByAssemblyUrl(String pattern,
                                                     boolean loadSlot)
                                                     throws PSAssemblyException
Find templates that share the same content assembler, if any.

Parameters:
pattern - a string pattern to match in the assemblyurl like the following one: ../appName/% and never null
loadSlot - if true loads slots
Returns:
the list of templates, never null but can be empty
Throws:
PSAssemblyException

findTemplatesByContentType

List<IPSAssemblyTemplate> findTemplatesByContentType(IPSGuid contenttype)
                                                     throws PSAssemblyException
Find templates that are related to a given contenttype. Note that the returned templates are read-only instances

Parameters:
contenttype - the contenttype, never null
Returns:
the list of templates, never null but can be empty
Throws:
PSAssemblyException

saveTemplate

void saveTemplate(IPSAssemblyTemplate var)
                  throws PSAssemblyException
Save the given template to the database.

Parameters:
var - the template, never null
Throws:
PSAssemblyException - if an error occurs saving the template to the database

loadTemplateNameMap

Map<String,Map<IPSGuid,IPSGuid>> loadTemplateNameMap()
Load a map that associates a template name to a map that goes from content type guids to template guids. This map is kept statically and invalidated when there is a change to either a template or content type. The returned map should be treated as read-only.

Returns:
the map, never null

findTemplate

IPSAssemblyTemplate findTemplate(IPSGuid id)
Finds the given template. The returned object is a shared and cached instance that must not be modified. It is a complete tree that includes all aggregated objects, if any. The returned object cannot be saved by saveTemplate(IPSAssemblyTemplate).

Parameters:
id - the ID of the template, never null.
Returns:
the template. It may be null if the template does not exist.

findTemplateByName

IPSAssemblyTemplate findTemplateByName(String name)
                                       throws PSAssemblyException
Finds the given template. The returned object is a shared and cached instance that must not be modified. It is a complete tree that includes all aggregated objects, if any. The returned object cannot be saved by saveTemplate(IPSAssemblyTemplate).

Parameters:
name - the name of the template, never null
Returns:
the template
Throws:
PSAssemblyException - if the template is not found or there are other problems loading the template from the database including the given template name not being unique

findTemplateByNameAndType

IPSAssemblyTemplate findTemplateByNameAndType(String name,
                                              IPSGuid contenttype)
                                              throws PSAssemblyException
Load a given template as specified by a content type and name.

Parameters:
name - the template name, never null or empty
contenttype - the guid that references the content type, never null
Returns:
a template, never null
Throws:
PSAssemblyException - if the template is not found or there are other problems loading the template(s) from the database.

findTemplates

List<IPSAssemblyTemplate> findTemplates(String name,
                                        String contentType,
                                        Set<IPSAssemblyTemplate.OutputFormat> outputFormats,
                                        IPSAssemblyTemplate.TemplateType type,
                                        Boolean globalFilter,
                                        Boolean legacyFilter,
                                        String assembler)
                                        throws PSAssemblyException
Finds all templates filtered for the supplied name and content type.

Parameters:
name - the name of the templates to find, may be null or empty in which case the name is excluded from the search criteria, sql type (%) wildcards are accepted.
contentType - the content type of the templates to find, may be null or empty in which case the name is excluded from the search criteria, sql type (%) wildcards are accepted.
outputFormats - a set with all output formats for which to filter the results, may be null or empty to ignore this filter.
type - the template type for which to filter that results, may be null to ignore this filter.
globalFilter - a flag to specify whether to filter all results for global or non-global templates. If true only global type templates are returned, if false only non-global type templates are returned, if null is supplied the filter is ignored.
legacyFilter - a flag to specify whether to filter all results for legacy or non-legacy templates. If true only legacy type templates are returned, if false only non-legacy type templates are returned, if null is supplied the filter is ignored.
assembler - the name of the assembler for which to filter the results, may be null or empty to ignore this filter.
Returns:
a list with all found assembly templates for the specified name and content type, never null, may be empty.
Throws:
PSAssemblyException

deleteTemplate

void deleteTemplate(IPSGuid id)
                    throws PSAssemblyException
Remove the specified template from the database.

Parameters:
id - the GUID of the template to be removed, never null
Throws:
PSAssemblyException - if an error occurs deleting the template from the database

createSlot

IPSTemplateSlot createSlot()
Create a new slot object, but does not persist it. You must call this method to create a new slot object to be persisted.

Returns:
a new slot object, never null, with no allocated GUID.

findSlot

IPSTemplateSlot findSlot(IPSGuid id)
Load the given slot instance from the database by id. The returned slot is a shared instance that must not be modified, and it is a complete tree that includes all aggregated objects, if any.

Parameters:
id - the id of the slot, never null
Returns:
the slot, it may be null if cannot find the slot.

loadSlot

IPSTemplateSlot loadSlot(IPSGuid id)
                         throws com.percussion.services.error.PSNotFoundException
Load the given slot instance from the database by id. This is a fast call, but will return a shared instance that must not be modified. The returned object is a complete tree that includes all aggregated objects, if any.

Parameters:
id - the ID of the slot, never null.
Returns:
the slot, never null
Throws:
com.percussion.services.error.PSNotFoundException - if the slot information is missing from the database

loadSlotModifiable

IPSTemplateSlot loadSlotModifiable(IPSGuid id)
                                   throws com.percussion.services.error.PSNotFoundException
Load the given slot instance from the database by id.

Parameters:
id - the id of the slot, never null
Returns:
the slot, never null
Throws:
com.percussion.services.error.PSNotFoundException - if the slot information is missing from the database

loadSlot

IPSTemplateSlot loadSlot(String idstr)
                         throws com.percussion.services.error.PSNotFoundException
Load the given slot instance from the database by id string. This is a fast call, but will return a shared instance that must not be modified. The returned object is a complete tree that includes all aggregated objects, if any.

Parameters:
idstr - the idstr of the slot, never null or empty and must be convertable to a GUID by PSGuid.PSGuid(String).
Returns:
the slot, never null
Throws:
com.percussion.services.error.PSNotFoundException - if the slot information is missing from the database

loadSlots

List<IPSTemplateSlot> loadSlots(List<IPSGuid> ids)
Load all template slots for the supplied IDs. The same as loadSlot(IPSGuid), the returned objects must not be modified and saved back to the repository.

Parameters:
ids - the IDs for which to load the template slots, not null or empty.
Returns:
a list with all loaded template slots in the same order as requested, never null or empty.
Throws:
com.percussion.services.error.PSNotFoundException - if failed to load any the of slots.

saveSlot

void saveSlot(IPSTemplateSlot var)
              throws PSAssemblyException
Save the given slot to the database.

Parameters:
var - the slot, never null. It must not be a cached object, e.g. returned by loadSlot(IPSGuid).
Throws:
PSAssemblyException - if an error occurs saving the slot to the database

findSlotByName

IPSTemplateSlot findSlotByName(String name)
                               throws PSAssemblyException
Load the given slot from the database.

Parameters:
name - the name of the slot, never null or empty
Returns:
the slot, never null
Throws:
PSAssemblyException - if the slot is missing from the database

findSlotsByName

List<IPSTemplateSlot> findSlotsByName(String name)
Load all template slots for the supplied name.

Parameters:
name - the name of the template slot, may be null or empty in which case all slots will be returned, sql type (%) wildcards are accepted.
Returns:
a list with all found slot templates for the specified name, never null, may be empty, in ascending alpha order.

findSlotsByNames

List<IPSTemplateSlot> findSlotsByNames(List<String> names)
Load all template slots for the supplied names.

Parameters:
names - the names of the template slot, never null or empty. Names are exactly matched in an "in" clause
Returns:
a list with all found slot templates for the specified name, never null, may be empty, in ascending alpha order.

deleteSlot

void deleteSlot(IPSGuid id)
                throws PSAssemblyException
Remove the specified slot from the database.

Parameters:
id - the slot to be removed, never null
Throws:
PSAssemblyException - if an error occurs deleting the slot from the database

loadUnmodifiableTemplate

IPSAssemblyTemplate loadUnmodifiableTemplate(IPSGuid tid)
                                             throws PSAssemblyException
Load a template that will remain unmodified. There are some minor modifications that may occur internally to transient data, but all persisted data should remain unchanged to avoid concurrency issues.

Parameters:
tid - the id of the template to load, never null
Returns:
the template, which will be loaded from an in-memory cache if possible, never null
Throws:
PSAssemblyException - if there's a problem loading the template from the database, see loadTemplate(IPSGuid, boolean) for more information

loadUnmodifiableTemplate

IPSAssemblyTemplate loadUnmodifiableTemplate(String tid)
                                             throws PSAssemblyException
Load a template that will remain unmodified. There are some minor modifications that may occur internally to transient data, but all persisted data should remain unchanged to avoid concurrency issues.

Parameters:
tid - the id of the template to load, never null or empty
Returns:
the template, which will be loaded from an in-memory cache if possible, never null
Throws:
PSAssemblyException - if there's a problem loading the template from the database, see loadTemplate(IPSGuid, boolean) for more information
